    Paint Me – insights

    04 January 2011

    Like everything, there is always an idea at the very beginning and this time was no exception.Rui Horta gave us a drawing with a set design to be created in 3D. Creating environments in 3D is always good for a first impression of the set, to detect possible flaws and to comunicate ideas with set designers, performers, musichians, technicians and with everyone involved.
